answers.answer: If ur not getting headaches, blured vision and ur blood pressure and urine are normal then its just the weight and fluid of baby causing it. Im 36wks and last nite noticed my feet and ankles swollen, now ive noticed my whole legs are swollen.starting to worry myself but my bloodpressure and urine where normal at my apt today so theres nothing i can do just rest my legs up abit i guess.
Check you bp.& definetly tell ur doc. Don't take it lightly they could b sign of preeclampsia. Goodluck hope u fe better
Thank you ladies.. I called my doc and they said for me to drink plenty of water and rest stay off my feet and if they are still swollen tomorrow to call back and come in.

If it is normal and has nothing to do with preeclampsia I recommend buying Arnica, you can buy it at Walmart in the Hispanic isle (where they have African American hair products) sry if it sounds racial it's just the only isle I've seen it. I love it especially when my feet are swollen, hurting, and irritated ( feeling hot). It's also good for muscle aches :) I hope this help you I know how you feel.

question: They havent went down like they normally do.. they usually swell for a bit then go down but they are staying swollen and I cant even bend my toes.. or make a full fist. Should I be concerned or talk to my doc?.. with my first they kept me in the labor and delivery over night to check on me every so often and do blood work..
title: past two days swollen feet and hands.. what should I do
